lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit

wikiData.title: Schneider v. Rusk
wikiData.Prior: Appeal from the United States District Court for the District of Columbia
wikiData.Holding: Naturalized U.S. citizens have the right to return to and reside in their native countries, and retain their U.S. citizenship, even if they never return to the United States.
wikiData.LawsApplied: [[Fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution|U.S. Const. amend. V]]
